name: Tomaton
description:
It's like dark souls but made from scratch during Ludum Dare. Also with robots because they are easier to model quickly.

  • If your game is lagging or the player feels slow
  • please adjust graphic settings from the launcher

Instructions on how to play are in the game.

A lot of planned features were cut, because after who knows how many jams I still can't contain my scope creep.  Sorry about the lack of audio.

I'm just happy I got a lot of the core mechanics in place in the span of the JAM. The animations gave me a major headache, but I think it looks alright all things considered. 

Hope you all enjoy! I do plan on finishing some stuff up on this post Jam!

Tools Used: Unity, Blender, Pyxel Edit, and Gimp
